properties.Replacement Value:
DO $$
BEGIN
    UPDATE stores SET 
        name = '${name}', 
        code = '${code}', 
        fullname = '${fullname}', 
        write_date = ${write_date}, 
        source_system_code = ${source_system_code}, 
        extracted_timestamp = ${extracted_timestamp}, 
        batch_id = '${batch_id}'
    WHERE id = ${id};
    
    IF NOT FOUND THEN
        INSERT INTO stores (id, name, code, fullname, write_date, source_system_code, extracted_timestamp, batch_id)
        VALUES (${id}, '${name}', '${code}', '${fullname}', ${write_date}, ${source_system_code}, ${extracted_timestamp}, '${batch_id}');
    END IF;
END
$$;
